Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Halsted
ShortDescription: #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Racine, 51st, Halsted and 47th over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Racine, 51st, Halsted and 47th over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Halsted.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Thorndale
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Thorndale due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Thorndale due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating only between Bryn Mawr and 95th at this time via 95th-bound platforms.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

To gain access northbound between Thorndale and Howard, back ride using 95th-bound Red Line trains.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing at 69th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 69th due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 69th due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
